00177 class TimeTextCtrlAx: public wxWindowAccessible
00178 {
00179 public:
00180    TimeTextCtrlAx(TimeTextCtrl * ctrl);
00181 
00182    virtual ~ TimeTextCtrlAx();
00183 
00184    // Performs the default action. childId is 0 (the action for this object)
00185    // or > 0 (the action for a child).
00186    // Return wxACC_NOT_SUPPORTED if there is no default action for this
00187    // window (e.g. an edit control).
00188    virtual wxAccStatus DoDefaultAction(int childId);
00189 
00190    // Retrieves the address of an IDispatch interface for the specified child.
00191    // All objects must support this property.
00192    virtual wxAccStatus GetChild(int childId, wxAccessible **child);
00193 
00194    // Gets the number of children.
00195    virtual wxAccStatus GetChildCount(int *childCount);
00196 
00197    // Gets the default action for this object (0) or > 0 (the action for a child).
00198    // Return wxACC_OK even if there is no action. actionName is the action, or the empty
00199    // string if there is no action.
00200    // The retrieved string describes the action that is performed on an object,
00201    // not what the object does as a result. For example, a toolbar button that prints
00202    // a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document."
00203    virtual wxAccStatus GetDefaultAction(int childId, wxString *actionName);
00204 
00205    // Returns the description for this object or a child.
00206    virtual wxAccStatus GetDescription(int childId, wxString *description);
00207 
00208    // Gets the window with the keyboard focus.
00209    // If childId is 0 and child is NULL, no object in
00210    // this subhierarchy has the focus.
00211    // If this object has the focus, child should be 'this'.
00212    virtual wxAccStatus GetFocus(int *childId, wxAccessible **child);
00213 
00214    // Returns help text for this object or a child, similar to tooltip text.
00215    virtual wxAccStatus GetHelpText(int childId, wxString *helpText);
00216 
00217    // Returns the keyboard shortcut for this object or child.
00218    // Return e.g. ALT+K
00219    virtual wxAccStatus GetKeyboardShortcut(int childId, wxString *shortcut);
00220 
00221    // Returns the rectangle for this object (id = 0) or a child element (id > 0).
00222    // rect is in screen coordinates.
00223    virtual wxAccStatus GetLocation(wxRect & rect, int elementId);
00224 
00225    // Gets the name of the specified object.
00226    virtual wxAccStatus GetName(int childId, wxString *name);
00227 
00228    // Returns a role constant.
00229    virtual wxAccStatus GetRole(int childId, wxAccRole *role);
00230 
00231    // Gets a variant representing the selected children
00232    // of this object.
00233    // Acceptable values:
00234    // - a null variant (IsNull() returns TRUE)
00235    // - a list variant (GetType() == wxT("list"))
00236    // - an integer representing the selected child element,
00237    //   or 0 if this object is selected (GetType() == wxT("long"))
00238    // - a "void*" pointer to a wxAccessible child object
00239    virtual wxAccStatus GetSelections(wxVariant *selections);
00240 
00241    // Returns a state constant.
00242    virtual wxAccStatus GetState(int childId, long *state);
00243 
00244    // Returns a localized string representing the value for the object
00245    // or child.
00246    virtual wxAccStatus GetValue(int childId, wxString *strValue);
00247 
00248 private:
00249    TimeTextCtrl *mCtrl;
00250    int mLastField;
00251    int mLastDigit;
00252 };
